usage.cn: 当你最后看到那绚丽的光芒，就会明白，所有的痛，都是值得的。
usage.eng: The light at the end is worth the pain.

usage.cn: 原谅别人。同时也放过自己。
usage.eng: Forgive. at the same time, let yourself.

usage.cn: 你嫣然的微笑是我每日享受到的魅力。
usage.eng: Your smiling at me is my daily dose of magic.

usage.cn: 每一个沐浴在爱河中的人都是诗人
usage.eng: At the touch of love everyone becomes a poet.
